Module com.um_project_golf
Package com.um_project_golf.Game.GameUtils.FieldManager

Class GameStateManager

java.lang.Object
com.um_project_golf.Game.GameUtils.FieldManager.GameStateManager
public class GameStateManager extends Object
The game state manager class. This class is responsible for managing the game state of the game. Stores the game state variables.
